description: Describes the details of a pipeline.

parameters.name: PipelineName
parameters.description: The name or Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the pipeline to describe.

nested_items.name: PipelineArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the pipeline.

nested_items.name: PipelineName
nested_items.description: The name of the pipeline.

nested_items.name: PipelineDisplayName
nested_items.description: The display name of the pipeline.

nested_items.name: PipelineDefinition
nested_items.description: The JSON pipeline definition.

nested_items.name: PipelineDescription
nested_items.description: The description of the pipeline.

nested_items.name: RoleArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) that the pipeline uses to execute.

nested_items.name: PipelineStatus
nested_items.description: The status of the pipeline execution.

nested_items.name: CreationTime
nested_items.description: The time when the pipeline was created.

nested_items.name: LastModifiedTime
nested_items.description: The time when the pipeline was last modified.

nested_items.name: LastRunTime
nested_items.description: The time when the pipeline was last run.

nested_items.name: CreatedBy
nested_items.description: Information about the user who created or modified an experiment, trial, trial component, lineage group, project, or model card.

nested_items.name: UserProfileArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the user's profile.

nested_items.name: UserProfileName
nested_items.description: The name of the user's profile.

nested_items.name: DomainId
nested_items.description: The domain associated with the user.

nested_items.name: IamIdentity
nested_items.description: The IAM Identity details associated with the user. These details are associated with model package groups, model packages, and project entities only.

nested_items.name: Arn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the IAM identity.

nested_items.name: PrincipalId
nested_items.description: The ID of the principal that assumes the IAM identity.

nested_items.name: SourceIdentity
nested_items.description: The person or application which assumes the IAM identity.

nested_items.name: LastModifiedBy
nested_items.description: Information about the user who created or modified an experiment, trial, trial component, lineage group, project, or model card.

nested_items.name: UserProfileArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the user's profile.

nested_items.name: UserProfileName
nested_items.description: The name of the user's profile.

nested_items.name: DomainId
nested_items.description: The domain associated with the user.

nested_items.name: IamIdentity
nested_items.description: The IAM Identity details associated with the user. These details are associated with model package groups, model packages, and project entities only.

nested_items.name: Arn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the IAM identity.

nested_items.name: PrincipalId
nested_items.description: The ID of the principal that assumes the IAM identity.

nested_items.name: SourceIdentity
nested_items.description: The person or application which assumes the IAM identity.

nested_items.name: ParallelismConfiguration
nested_items.description: Lists the parallelism configuration applied to the pipeline.

nested_items.name: MaxParallelExecutionSteps
nested_items.description: The max number of steps that can be executed in parallel.
